examples: The sun shone brightly in a cloudless sky.
El sol brillaba intensamente en un cielo despejado.
A light was shining in the distance.
Una luz brillaba en la distancia.
The dark polished wood shone like glass.
La madera oscura y pulida brillaba como vidrio.
The stars were shining and the moon was bright.
Las estrellas brillaban y la luna brillaba.
